title: Are we bringing back draft mode?
body:
Just wondering rito, if there are plans to bring back draft mode now that its been updated. I'd much rather play this new teambuilder/ranked queue combo in normals, than our regular normal queue. 

Jus wonderin

replies.body: They should put in normal draft because we don't have teambuilder.{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
yes the should, now that ive tried the new champ select in a single ranked game i dont think i can go bak to the obnoxius shit that is blind pick.... plz oce riot implement normal draft already :'(
Draft and Blind pick are being removed from OCE once the rollout of the new queue type is complete.

> [{quoted}](name=Klavinmour,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=BRZE6qOh,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-01-20T03:28:20.688+0000)
>
> Draft and Blind pick are being removed from OCE once the rollout of the new queue type is complete.

What's replacing blind pick? Normal draft?
The new queue that has so far been used for ranked.
